de.hohenheim.view.mobile.animation
Interface Animator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BusyAnimator, BusyWaitAnimator, WalkToAnimator
public interface Animator

Version:
1.0 Interface which must be implemented by all animations.
Author:
Marc Fernandes

Method Summary
 boolean isFinished()
          Returns true if the animation is finished, i.e. when the animation has run once completely
 boolean isStopped()
          Returns true if the animation was stopped succesfully.
 void start()
          Starts the animation.
 void stop()
          Stops the animation.
